name: Vroom Room: Physics Playground
description:
SMASH YOUR CAR THROUGH THOUSANDS OF OBJECTS!
Yes, we counted! Plow your vehicle and see how quickly you can knock things down.  You'll have a blast!

THINGS TO DO:

  1. Smash things!
  2. Drive a bit.
  3. Smash more things!
  4. Hit some pipes!
  5. Cry a little...
  6. Play some more!

So what do ya reckon? Give it a go! Updates released REGULARLY!

PS. While in game, type 'IAMSPEED' in to your keyboard and see what happens :D
